author: Tony Conigliaro
description: A wonderfully fresh herbal Martini with the distinctive taste of Chartreuse. You'll either love it or hate it.
name: 'Martini' Thyme
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE thyme in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
